doc:
Tim Spencer (singer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Spencer_(singer) 0 Vernon Harold Timothy Spencer (July 13, 1908 – April 26, 1974) was an American singer, songwriter, and actor. Spencer is best known for founding the popular American Cowboy singing group the Sons of the Pioneers in 1933 along with Bob Nolan and Roy Rogers. Vernon_Harold_Timothy_Spencer ( July_13_,_1908 – April_26_,_1974 ) was an_American_singer , songwriter , and actor . Spencer is_best_known for founding the_popular_American_Cowboy_singing_group the_Sons of the_Pioneers in 1933 along with Bob_Nolan and Roy_Rogers .
